other_tests.findings: No Fc-EDA detectable in the maternal circulation; genetic testing confirmed hemizygosity for the EDA Y304C mutation.
other_tests.changes_over_time: At birth (gestational week 33), treated twins were able to sweat normally, with sustained sweating ability reported at 14 to 22 months of age.

other_tests.findings: Assays of Fc-EDA in amniotic fluid showed no detectable levels before injection.
Genetic testing confirmed hemizygosity for the EDA mutation c.924+1dupG (p.V309GfsX8) with healthy prenatal progression after treatment.
other_tests.changes_over_time: The treated boy was born at gestational week 39 with normal sweat pore density and Apgar scores of 10.
